# API Attack Surface Mapper - SaaS Project

## Project Overview
Full-stack SaaS application for discovering, analyzing, and reporting publicly accessible APIs and their security vulnerabilities.

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React.js with Vite
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Database: MongoDB
- AI Integration: OpenAI GPT-4
- Security Tools: OWASP ZAP, Sublist3r, Amass
- External APIs: Shodan API

## Features
- [x] API Discovery (subdomain enumeration, endpoint detection)
- [x] Vulnerability Scanning (OWASP ZAP integration)
- [x] AI Risk Analysis (OpenAI GPT-4 integration)
- [x] Real-time Monitoring
- [x] Authentication & Authorization
- [x] Dashboard & Reporting
